definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Have a bright shape, lively & open, auto fans, a member of amateur racing car organization.
sentences.chinese: 形象陽光，活潑開朗，喜愛汽車，參加業餘賽車隊。

sentences.english: The Nurburgring demands that kind of versatility .
sentences.chinese: 紐博格林需要這種全能性賽車。

sentences.english: I was sliding everywhere, with absolutely no grip at all.
sentences.chinese: 賽車根本沒有抓地力，我一直在不斷的打滑。

sentences.english: They are testing the newly-made sports car.
sentences.chinese: 他們正在檢測新出的賽車。

sentences.english: I did a double-take when I saw her dressed in biker 's gear.
sentences.chinese: 看見她一身賽車手打扮，我一時沒反應過來。

sentences.english: Only listens to the F1 vehicle race the engine bellow, you return think very excitedly.
sentences.chinese: 光聽F1賽車的引擎轟鳴聲，你就回覺得無比興奮。

sentences.english: Seven people are dead after a drag-racing crash at a Tennessee charity event.
sentences.chinese: 田納西州慈善賽車發生意外造成七人死亡。

sentences.english: Street-legal race cars are often as good-looking as they are fast.
sentences.chinese: 街頭賽車爲法律好看，因爲他們往往是快速。

sentences.english: All of the competing race bike dseas are not Very abundance skilled.
sentences.chinese: 所有競爭的賽車選手都有高超的技能。

sentences.english: In addition there are a number of requirements that apply to liveries for all cars and teams.
sentences.chinese: 另外，還有許多針對賽車和車隊塗裝的要求。

sentences.english: Even race cars make pit stops.
sentences.chinese: 即使是賽車也需要停站。

sentences.english: I can confirm that I like the F60 more than last year's car.
sentences.chinese: 我可以證實，我喜歡比去年的賽車更多的液晶顯示屏。

sentences.english: It is located in the Sheshan Songjiang district, in the Western outskirts of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 天馬賽車場坐落於上海市西郊的松江區。

sentences.english: I enjoy visiting new racetracks and I'm looking forward to getting into the cockpit on Friday morning.
sentences.chinese: 我很享受新的賽道，我期待着週五早上坐進賽車。

sentences.english: I think Donington has a lot of racing heritage.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲多寧頓也有豐富的賽車積澱。

sentences.english: I think starvation takes priority over hotwheels and barbies.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得飢餓使窮人無緣接觸到賽車和芭比娃娃。

definition: racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)

to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
